datasourceConfigModel.label: User ID
datasourceConfigModel.description: To find your User ID, go to Instagram the API console. Select 'OAuth2' from the Authentication drop-down menu and then click the 'Sign in to Instagram' button that is in the pop-up window. Finally, paste 'https://api.instagram.com/v1/users/self' in the query box. Your ID is listed at the bottom of the results.
